trends: There have been 67 other sightings in Louisville
There were no other sightings in Louisville on or around August 19th 2012
divs: sighting detailsoutside taking out the trash. when i look up to the sky and see a red orb glowing like a solid rocket booster would do. it moved in a straight line across the sky in a sw direction. my sister and i watched it until it was out of sight. i noticed the object because it was unlike anything in the sky i have seen. i live near the airport so i know the difference between planes and other things in the sky. like i said this thing was glowing red\orange like a rocket booster would in the night sky. i lost the object as it flew out of distance and then when i looked back to see if it was there again it was no where to be seen in the sky.
Summary: Glowing ball of light almost like a rocket booster glow.
